title: Prohibits a person from operating a truck while anyone is in the cargo area of such truck
summary: Prohibits a person from operating a truck while anyone under the age of eighteen is in the cargo area of such truck; provides certain exceptions for farm type tractors, trucks used for agricultural purposes and trucks used in parades.

       AN  ACT  to  amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to riding in
         cargo areas of trucks

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1.  Subdivision  2 of section 1222 of the vehicle and traffic
    2  law, as amended by chapter 913 of the laws of 1974, is amended  to  read
    3  as follows:
    4    2.  [No]  A. EXCEPT AS PROVIDED IN PARAGRAPH B OF THIS SUBDIVISION, NO
    5  operator of any [motor vehicle commonly known as an  auto]  truck  shall
    6  operate  such  [auto] truck, nor shall the owner thereof permit it to be
    7  operated, [in excess of five miles,] while there are [in excess of five]
    8  persons under eighteen years of age in the body of such truck [unless at
    9  least one person over eighteen years of age also rides in  the  body  of
   10  said truck].
   11    B.  THE  PROVISIONS OF PARAGRAPH A OF THIS SUBDIVISION SHALL NOT APPLY
   12  TO (I) FARM TYPE TRACTORS USED EXCLUSIVELY FOR AGRICULTURAL PURPOSES  OR
   13  OTHER  FARM  EQUIPMENT  WHEN  MAKING  ONLY  INCIDENTAL USE OF A HIGHWAY,
   14  PROVIDED THAT NO SUCH PASSENGERS ARE UNDER THE AGE OF TWELVE YEARS; (II)
   15  TRUCKS WHILE ENGAGED IN USE FOR AGRICULTURAL PURPOSES WHEN  MAKING  ONLY
   16  INCIDENTAL  USE  OF  A  HIGHWAY AND PROVIDED THAT NO SUCH PASSENGERS ARE
   17  UNDER THE AGE OF TWELVE YEARS;  AND  (III)  TRUCKS  PARTICIPATING  IN  A
   18  PARADE PURSUANT TO A MUNICIPAL PERMIT, PROVIDED THAT AT LEAST ONE PERSON
   19  OVER EIGHTEEN YEARS OF AGE ALSO RIDES IN THE BODY OF SAID TRUCK.
   20    S  2.  Paragraph (iii) of subdivision 2 of section 1233 of the vehicle
   21  and traffic law, as amended by chapter 377  of  the  laws  of  1980,  is

    8    S 4. This act shall take effect on the first of November next succeed-
    9  ing the date on which it shall have become a law.
